citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15 PM on
10/09/2014.
Spoke with the licensee via cell phone and she was at a previously scheduled appointment.
